resources.string: Documents that include name/address/date of birth is needed for verification purposes. One of the following is required: driver’s license/health insurance card/passport/resident certificate. After uploading, we will be sending documents with regards to the transaction to the registered address.
About uploading documents for user verification >

If your current address does not match with the address that you have submitted, please submit either of the following below

1. Utility bills

Bills of your phone company (only for landline phones), electric utility company, water utility company, gas utility company, NHK

2. Receipt for national or local tax
3. Certificate of tax payment
4. Receipt for Social Insurance premium

※ All documents submitted must be not be over 6 months from the issue date\n※ Please send the receipts for the utility bills and invoice that belongs to the person who is verifying. As long as your address and last name matches, it is also acceptable for family members who are living together to submit as well.
Please register the same address written on the user verification document or the additional documents
Reasons for transaction fixed convention (Unable to select)
Postal code must be exactly 7 digits
